name: Lightning of life
description:
Controls:

W A S D  or arrows to move.

TAB to turn off UI.

1 and 2 to switch weapons shown in the inventory.

Hold mouse to shoot.

F1, F2, F3 for different screen sizes.

You must turn full screen in options. 

Description:

This is short 10 stages experience with a boss fight at the end. 

Even if this game is short you can always shoot for better score. Each time you play game will form 10 stages of random enemies, with increasing difficulty. 

At fifth wave you will get random new more powerful weapon.

 I worked on this project for 1 month so you can expect a good amount of detail and polish. 

If you like the game you can always leave a tip to encourage me to continue making games.
